mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USER ( USER_NAME, USER_EMAIL, PASSWORD, REG_DT, REG_ID, USER_ASS ) VALUES ( #{userName}, #{userEmail}, #{passWord}, SYSDATE(), #{userName}, '0' )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_NAME=#{userName}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM USER WHERE USER_EMAIL=#{userEmail}
SELECT USER_SEQ AS userSeq, USER_EMAIL AS userEmail, USER_NAME AS userName, USER_ASS AS userAss FROM USER WHERE USER_EMAIL = #{userEmail} AND PASSWORD = #{passWord}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `GROUP` ( GROUP_NAME, MAKE_DT, MAKE_ID, GREETING, FUNCTION ) VALUES ( #{groupName}, SYSDATE(), #{userName}, #{greeting}, #{function} )
